feed.title: [RFC] Proposal: Base58 encoded HD Wallet master seed with optional encryption

entry.title: [RFC] Proposal: Base58 encoded HD Wallet master seed with optional encryption
entry.summary: Jean-Paul Kogelman has made an update to a proposal on BitcoinTalk, adding a 2-byte 'weeks since 2013-01-01' field and updating the prefixes, ranges, and test vectors. The updated proposal can be found on the provided link. It is unclear if there has been any recent progress on this proposal. The question is raised whether or not this proposal could replace BIP38 and if there are any limitations that would prevent it from doing so.
